content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Repeated attempts to craft and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs have not succeeded due to inventory shortages and crafting failures. No additional agent‐assembled structures are present.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Errors for get_entities()
  – Use the exact parameter conventions supported by the API. Avoid unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and supplying positional arguments if the function expects none.
• Lab Placement and Inventory Issues
  – Confirm that the lab item exists in inventory before attempting placement.
• Handling of None Returns
  – Check results from functions like get_entities() and default to an empty list when the returned value is None to avoid iteration errors.
• Crafting Chain Prerequisites for Lab
  – Ensure that all intermediary ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, and copper plates) are available through proper smelting and crafting processes before starting lab production.
• Missing Resource Shortages
  – Verify that production targets for essential items (such as additional iron-gear-wheels) are met to fulfill the complete recipe requirements for lab crafting.
